item.title: About
item.author: pob@aol.com (Adnan Baig)
item.description:
I wanted to make a blog that focused more on Islam as a pose to just a general blog like baigelbytes.com.

Also, I’ve been learning about and exploring Shia Islam for a few months at least as of writing this (05.2025) and I feel like Shia Islam is severely under reprisented in the public eye.

One could say that this is because there are less Shias in the world compared to Sunni’s but then there are less vegans in the world compared to non-vegans and you can’t go to a western country at least where the term hasn’t been at least heard of.

item.title: Wisdom
item.author: pob@aol.com (Adnan Baig)
item.description:
Quotes from Holy Books, religious literature and figures throught history.

“What you hide in your heart, appears in your eyes.” ― Imam Ali


“Be gentle with human hearts, for when they are forced into something, they go blind.” ― Imam Ali


“Except those who have faith, do good deeds, call each other to truth and call each other to patience.” - Quran 103:3


“Shall I tell you who are the best among you? The best of you are those who when seen are a means of Allah being brought to mind.” - Prophet Muhammad (SAW) in Al-Tirmidhi


“Practice makes knowledge perfect.” ― Imam Ali
